                                                  throws ValidationException

      • bulkChangeMemberGroup

        public BulkMemberActionResultVO bulkChangeMemberGroup(FullTextMemberQuery query,
                                             MemberGroup newGroup,
                                             java.lang.String comments)
                                               throws ValidationException
        Description copied from interface: ElementService
        Changes the group of all members returned by the query. For members that are already on the selected group, nothing is done.
        Specified by:
        bulkChangeMemberGroup in interface ElementService
        Throws:
        ValidationException

      • changeGroup

        public <E extends Element> E changeGroup(E element,
                                Group newGroup,
                                java.lang.String comments)
                              throws MemberHasBalanceException,
                                     MemberHasOpenInvoicesException,
                                     ValidationException
        Description copied from interface: ElementService
        Changes the group of the specified user. If the new group has status of removed:
        • Only let the group be changed if there are no accounts with balance and no open invoices
        • All contacts must be removed
        • If the member is a broker, all brokered members should have their broker changed to null, generating a remark with messageSettings.brokerRemovedMessage as comments
        Specified by:
        changeGroup in interface ElementService
        Throws:
        MemberHasBalanceException - When the new group is removed and the member has balance on any of his accounts
        MemberHasOpenInvoicesException - When the new group is removed and the member has open incoming invoices
        ValidationException - When any of the arguments are null or empty, when the new group is the same as the old or when the member is removed

      • getPossibleNewGroups

        public java.util.List<? extends Group> getPossibleNewGroups(Element element)
        Description copied from interface: ElementService
        Lists the possible new groups for the given element, ordering by nature (admin / member then broker / operator) and name. If the group is removed, it can't be changed, so, the list will contain only it. Otherwise, returns all other groups, according to the group nature.
        Specified by:
        getPossibleNewGroups in interface ElementService

                        boolean forceChangePassword,
                        java.lang.String remoteAddress)
        Description copied from interface: ElementService

        Specified by:

      • remove

        public void remove(java.lang.Long id)
            throws UnexpectedEntityException
        Description copied from interface: ElementService
        Removes the specified user. Unless the user had no activity on the system, this operation won't be permitted. In that case, the user should be moved into a removed group.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface ElementService
        Throws:
        UnexpectedEntityException - When the given id is for a member, and he/she is currently active (has open loans / invoices or non-zero accounts, for example)
